Texts.Chs:
来自一颗被黑暗覆盖的星球的蛛状种族，被守护团发现并迅速融入了航天社会。虽然令人毛骨悚然，但他们通常都很友善，并且非常好奇。

食性：杂食性，包括生肉

^orange;天赋^reset;：
生命上限x^green;1.25^reset;
抗性：^green;40%^reset;毒素坑性，^green;20%^reset;暗影抗性
免疫：狂乱, 蜘蛛网

^orange;环境^reset;：
^green;黑暗生物群落^reset; (不包括非黑暗生物群落的“黑暗”变体。)：
   HP和能量x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：
矛：伤害x^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;15^reset;%暴击伤害
双手/组合武器(刀刃/短矛)： 伤害x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;1^reset;%暴击几率

^red;弱点^reset;：
抗性：^red;-20%^reset;火炎抗性，^red;-20%^reset;射线抗性
Texts.Eng:
A race of arachnid-like aliens from a darkness covered planet, Arachne were discovered by the Protectorate and quickly integrated into spacefaring society. While creepy, they're generally friendly and are an extremely curious people.

Diet: Omnivorous, But can eat Raw Meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.25^reset;
  Resist: +^green;40^reset;% Poison, +^green;20^reset;% Shadow 
  +^green;15^reset;% Speed
  Immunity: Insanity, Webs
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Dark biomes^reset; (Does not include 'dark' variants of non-dark biomes.):
    Health and Energy x^green;1.15^reset;
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spears: Damage x^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage
  Dual/Combo-Wielding (Bladed/Shortspear): Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Resist: -^red;20^reset;% Fire, Cosmic Resist
